help.title: Help
help.helpItem1: To delete all complete notes in current tab, press this button in the tab manager
help.helpItem2: To clear all notes in current tab, press this button in the tab manager
help.helpItem3: Click on the note to expand
help.helpItem4: To open note/tab management menu, press this button in note/tab
help.helpItem5: To manage the tabs, press this button in main page
help.helpItem6: To add new tab, click the button in the tab manager
help.helpItem7: To change name of a the note/tab, tap the name
help.helpItem8: To remove note/tab, press the button
help.helpItem9: To move the note/tab, hold the button
